name: Wespot Medoky and FCA Tool
tagline: Encompasses a backend web-service component for learner modelling and learning recommendations as well as 3 complementary elgg plugins visualizing the services.
body:
# About
The Formal Concept Analysis Tool Plugin relies on the Medoky service to present concepts to the user.

# Architecture
The following diagram illustrates how the FCA plugin communicates with the Medoky backend services. The Medoky architecture relies on user data that is managed by Event Data Store.

![](http://wespot.net/en/c/wiki/get_page_attachment?p_l_id=21015442&nodeId=7299941&title=ElggFCA&fileName=ElggFCA.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
